did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Programs, menus, press releases, broadsides, videocassettes and photographs concerning Hotel Ezra Cornell.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Hotel Ezra Cornell is a student-run annual hotel-for-a-day program at the School of Hotel Administration. The first Hotel Ezra Cornell was staged in Prudence Risley Hall in 1926.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Programs, menus, press releases, broadsides, videocassettes and photographs concerning Hotel Ezra Cornell.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Hotel Ezra Cornell records, #28-5-2328. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p: See also Cornell Hotel Association publications, #4699.

emph.ref: Series I. Programs, Menus, Reports, Press Releases and other Administrative Records
Series III. Audio and Visual Materials
Series IV. Dinner Plates, Glassware and Memorabilia
